column2: [From.GetTitledName] have died leaving you, [From.GetHerHis] [GetFromRelation], [From.GetHerHis] most prized possesions.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] have some possesions that doesn't befit [From.GetHerHis] positions as a prisoner, [From.GetSheHe] should be relieved of them.
On second thought [From.GetSheHe] can keep them.
One of the [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] possesions was a Gwyhyr sword, but I already own one myself. What to do with it?
It will fetch a good price.
I will give it some relative.
Maybe [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledName] will be able to put it to use.
One of the [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] possesions was a Nehalenia's Mirror, but I already own one myself. What to do with it?
It will fetch a good price.
I will give it some relative.
It will make a fine gift for [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName].
